name: Dark Cards (itch)
description:
Hello! 

My name is Jaime Sanchez and this is my final career project.

This game features a card game with a Hearthstone like system and an AI that uses Monte-Carlo Tree Search in order to predict the moves that the opponent could possibly do and react based on it. 

This project was developed over the course of three months by me with the advice of a supervisor. It was developed in Unity.

Enjoy!
